TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectCopyingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectCopyingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataObjectCopyingEventArgs)
public delegate void DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataObjectCopyingEventArgs ^ e);
type DataObjectCopyingEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataObjectCopyingEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的事件发生时复制操作已完成所选的内容转换为全部为指定数据格式、 具有关联的数据对象中存储所有数据格式和是准备将系统剪贴板上的数据对象或到开始拖动操作。The attached event occurs when a copy operation has finished converting the selected content into all specified data formats, has stored all data formats in the associated data object, and is ready to put the data object on the system clipboard or to begin a drag operation. 一个附加的事件处理程序方法通常会检查作为事件参数，传入的数据对象的内容，并执行自定义操作的数据对象，如添加、 删除或修改数据格式。A attached event handler method typically inspects the contents of the data object passed in as an event argument, and performs custom operations on the data object, such as adding, removing, or modifying data formats. 此处理程序方法还可通过调用取消复制事件。This handler method may also cancel the copying event by calling .
